name: Bloby the mistake
description:
Bloby is a small creature born of a chemical bottle and an outdated strawberry yogurt.

He only wants to do one thing when he wakes up : Get out of this gloomy place and discover the outside world.

Don’t be spotted by the horrible humans at the risk of him throwing you in the trash. Use your different transformations to explore your environment and find the exit.

It's unity project made in two month. There were four of us.
My role on this project:

- participation in Game design,

-player programming (3C: Character, Camera, Control),

-the implementation of all the components bloby (animation and 3D model designed by another member of the group)

Thank you for your reading and good game!

Created in 2019.
